name: Terror In The West
description:
*This game is a submission for the "VHS Horror Game Jam 2D"*

Story:

VHS games never really took off, but this one just seemed to call out to you. Like it NEEDED you. So you decided to take it home and give it a go.

The back reads:
Waking up beside your wagon in a ghost town, discover what happened here and find one of two endings to help solve the mystery of the town.

Controls:

Use the mouse to highlight areas of the screen.
The mouse ICON will change if you can travel a direction or interact with something.
Click the INVENTORY on the right to see what items you have available.
Be sure to investigate every part of each scene, not every path is obvious.

Figure out what happened to the townsfolk and decide their fate.

Thank you for playing!
